TEXT.TITLE: SUFFIELD FINANCIAL <SSBK> GETS FED APPROVAL
TEXT.BODY: Suffield Financial Corp said the Federal Reserve Board approved its application to acquire Coastal Bancorp <CSBK>, Portland, Me. Suffield said it still needs the approval of the superintendent of Maine's banking department. Reuter
